title: Naut and Skarner Jungle thoughts
body:
Hey!
Wondering if naut jungle is any good now, i would like the reason.
Also considering getting skarner, what are your thoughts on him?
Thanks!

replies.body: Susan  jg is good but its just like top you will need to farm for 30 min to get 600 on his q
Every time ive had either they have sucked.

if you wont a god like jg go tryindamon get a {{item:3930}} then a {{item:3046}} not a {{item:3087}} then you wont a {{item:3031}}  and a {{item:3072}} and then {{item:1304}} and to end you get a {{item:3035}} if they got lots of armour remember you wont to get the adc and mid first if they got no tank go for a {{item:3022}} for more slow and hp this is so op       wen you get the sated maxed go lane with top bot or min as you can 1v1 every one at this point as long as your team didn't feed them just keep on farming and you will win the game and if your team dose feed then just farm and get to late game a full build tryindamon has no counter
never played naut jungle but used to play alot of skarner jungle he's pretty fun in my opinion as a fighter/tank and hes got great mobility. not top teir but still pretty strong
